name: Balance Pass - #258
description:
The Balance Pass is an NFT Collection with a limited supply of 350 NFTs. Each pass offers unique utility within all upcoming projects within the Balance Ecosystem and their partners. Some of the utilities include:

- Discounts/no fees on Liqdnft.com our upcoming NFT lending and borrowing platform.
   ~ Platinum NFT Passes - 0.0% fees 
   ~ Gold NFT Passes - 50% off fees 
   ~ Genesis NFT Passes - 25% off fees 
- Access to auctions and instant loans for select Nfts.
- WL opportunities for future projects.
